thread.title: General Election 2017: Everything you need to know about the North Devon candidates | Devon Live

title: General Election 2017: Everything you need to know about the North Devon candidates | Devon Live
text:
Comments (0) 
These helpful videos will tell you what North Devon's general election candidates think about fox hunting, the NHS, education funding, Brexit and the police. 
As part of a series of Devon Live online Facebook hustings, chief reporter Joel Cooper asked all five of the North Devon parliamentary candidates what they thought about some of the big issues in this election. 
And we even gave them the opportunity to convince you to vote for them - in just two minutes. 
So if you're still not sure who to vote for, we hope these videos will give you the chance to make an informed decision on polling day. Here's what our candidates thought about: NHS Funding
